newsitem.title: TAIWAN: Nan Ya Jan-April sales up 8.8 pct yr/yr.
newsitem.headline: Nan Ya Jan-April sales up 8.8 pct yr/yr.

text.p: Nan Ya Plastics Corp, Taiwan's largest private industrial firm, said on Tuesday sales rose 8.8 percent in the first four months of 1997 to T$30.056 billion from T$27.622 billion a year earlier.
In April, its sales rose 7.4 percent to T$8.08 billion from T$7.522 billion in April 1996, Nan Ya said in a statement.
The April sales were down 0.1 percent from March's T$8.09 billion, it said.
The statement did not provide profit figures.
Nan Ya said it has set a sales target of T$94.921 billion for 1997.
